name: Kimbee
description: A speech therapy game for kids

scripts.install_android_cordova: cd _cordova && cordova platform add android && cd ..
scripts.install_microphone: cd _cordova && cordova plugin add org.chromium.audiocapture && cd ..
scripts.run_android_cordova: cd _cordova && cordova build && cordova run android && cd ..
scripts.android: rm -Rf _cordova && npm run-script install_cordova && npm run-script install_android_cordova && npm run-script cp_cordova && npm run-script install_microphone && npm run-script run_android_cordova
scripts.compile-game-ts: cd src/game; find . -name "*.ts" | xargs ../../node_modules/.bin/tsc --module AMD; cd ../..
scripts.serve: npm run-script make && cd src/server && node index.js

author: Aaron Nech & Ryan Drapeau & Nick Huynh
